# Semantic Checker - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Python-based semantic checker using local LLM (Ollama with Llama 3.1 8B) for semantic analysis.

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.11+: Main programming language
- Ollama 0.3.x: Local LLM runtime
- Llama 3.1 8B: Primary language model
- pandas 2.1+: Data manipulation and CSV parsing
- sentence-transformers: Embedding-based baseline
- scikit-learn: Evaluation metrics
- requests: Ollama API communication

## Project Setup Checklist
- [x] Create .github/copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Get project setup information
- [ ] Create project structure
- [ ] Create requirements.txt with dependencies
- [ ] Create main application files
- [ ] Create configuration files (README, .gitignore)
- [ ] Configure Python environment
- [ ] Install dependencies

## Development Guidelines
- Use Python 3.11+ features where appropriate
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Use type hints for better code clarity
- Keep functions focused and modular
- Add docstrings to all functions and classes
